name: DIGIT Public Finance Management
description: DIGIT – iFIX enables government agencies (national, sub-national, local governments, development institutions etc…) to exchange standardised fiscal events. Example: budget estimate, plan, demand, receipt, bill and payments related data. This accelerates flow of fiscal information across agencies which in turn accelerates flow of funds.

SDGs.evidenceText: DIGIT – iFIX enables government agencies (national, sub-national, local governments, development institutions etc…) to exchange standardised fiscal events. Example: budget estimate, plan, demand, receipt, bill and payments related data. This accelerates flow of fiscal information across agencies which in turn accelerates flow of funds.
